=== About Me ===
Its me, ABhinav Chittora, is a Foss activist, who loves contributing for free and open source software. Currently I am contributing for <nowiki>[[http://www.mozilla.org |Mozilla ]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.geeklog.net |Geeklog ]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.limesurvey.org |LimeSurvey]]</nowiki>. 

Other than contributing for above, I love to read some tech-blogs, chatting with friends and sleeping.

=== Team Memberships ===

I'm a member in the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~speechcontrolteam | Speech Control Team ]]</nowiki>, the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~speechcontrol-devel | SpeechControl Developers ]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~wintermute-devel | Wintermute Developers ]]</nowiki>.

Currently I am working on a project that will use voice to text conversion. The project is my dream project :D .

=== Projects on Which I have worked or Working ===

* <nowiki>[[ http:--code.google.com-p-fireice | Fireice]]</nowiki> : I have successfully completed the <nowiki>[[http://code.google.com/soc | Google Summer of Code 2009]]</nowiki> Project for Xiph.org foundation which was titled <nowiki>[[http://code.google.com/p/fireice |Fireice]]</nowiki>. The project was aimed to develop a Mozilla Firefox extension that will record sound locally and stream to Icecast servers.

* <nowiki>[[ https:--github.com-bijolianabhi-gtweetie | Gtweetie]]</nowiki> : It is a lightweight twitter Client written in Python. Currently, It's in Planning phase and as soon as I am done with planning will release it's beta version.

* <nowiki>[[ https:--github.com-bijolianabhi-Google-Gadget-Sidebar |Google Gadget Sidebar ]]</nowiki>: It's a Mozilla Firefox extension hosted at <nowiki>[[https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/google-gadgets-sidebar |Mozilla add-on Site ]]</nowiki>.

* <nowiki>[[https://github.com/bijolianabhi/Memorize | Momorize]]</nowiki>: Again an extension for Mozilla Firefox. This extension is related to voice Book-Marking in Firefox. Although I did a little work for this but its in queue :D .
